NK071(du)004:1: // gu ru s+ya mu kh+aa shi sh+ti m+aa y+aa gu
NK071(du)004:2: he g+ha r+b+ha s+y+aa n+ta s+th+aa na t+aa ra +aa
NK071(du)004:5: // sgyu 'phrul gsang ba snying po'i dka' gnad bsdus don bla ma'i zhal lung bzhugs /
NK071(du)004:7: na mahsh+r+ai badz+ra sa t+wa ye /
NK071(du)004:8: bde stong zung 'jug snang gsum rdul bral 'gyur med chos sku'i rgya mtsho che //
NK071(du)004:9: bsam yas 'gro la thugs rjes dbang bsgyur sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul rlabs kyi phreng //
NK071(du)004:10: dpe med g.yo zhing 'khor ba'i 'dam nas lus can sku bzhi'i go 'phang gi /
NK071(du)004:11: dpal la 'god mdzad rigs brgya'i tog gyur rdo rje 'chang dbang de la 'dud //
NK071(du)004:12: ma lus rgyal ba'i chos dbyings mngon par bsgyur ba'i 'phrul //
NK071(du)004:13: 'gog pa med pa gdul bya'i rdzing bu tha dad par //
NK071(du)004:14: zab gsang rol ba rab 'byams rgyud sde'i chos tshul gyis //
NK071(du)004:15: 'jig rten gsum snang gsang bdag dpa' bos shis gyur cig /
NK071(du)004:16: rgyal kun mkhyen brtse'i gzugs kyi srid bzung nas //
NK071(du)004:17: sa steng dam chos nyi ma gcig pu'i tshul //
NK071(du)004:18: snang bas srid pa rgya mtsho skem mdzad pa //
NK071(du)004:19: rnga yab gling pas byang chub bar du skyongs //
NK071(du)004:20: gang de'i gsang gsum ma lus phyogs gcig tu //
NK071(du)004:21: grub pa'i ngo mtshar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las //
NK071(du)004:22: rab 'byams rgyud don bdud rtsis bdag cag gi //
NK071(du)004:23: gdung sel dge ba'i bshes la phyag bagyi'o //
NK071(du)004:24: gsang chen sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud don gyi //
NK071(du)004:25: dngos bcu rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i gtan tshigs sogs //
NK071(du)004:26: bsdus don dam pa'i zhal rgyun 'dri ba la //
NK071(du)004:27: mkha' 'gro rgya mtshos gnang ba'i skabs phyes shig /
NK071(du)004:28: de la 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa
NK071(du)004:29: ba'i rgyud don thams cad mtshan nyid gsum dang dngos
NK071(du)004:30: po bcur bsdus nas 'chad pa la dang po ni
NK071(du)004:33: 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen //
NK071(du)004:34: nus mthu can du gang gyur pa //
NK071(du)004:35: rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags //
NK071(du)004:37: rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba /
NK071(du)004:38: rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin /
NK071(du)004:39: mngon du gyur pa 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang gsum mo //
NK071(du)004:40: gnyis pa dngos po bcu ni /
NK071(du)004:42: lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam tshig /
NK071(du)004:44: gsang sngags rgyud kyi dbye ba byed //
NK071(du)004:46: thun mong gi theg pa'i phar phyin bcu dang sbyar
NK071(du)004:47: na de kho na nyid lta ba ni shes rab
NK071(du)004:48: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste thag lta bas
NK071(du)004:49: gcod pa dang po gal che bas sngon du bstan
NK071(du)004:50: to // las dang po spyod pa ni brtul zhugs
NK071(du)004:51: kyi spyod pa la bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir
NK071(du)004:52: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni lta ba'i
NK071(du)004:53: to // grogs so // bkod pa dkyil 'khor ye
NK071(du)004:54: shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ye shes
NK071(du)004:55: nyid dkyil 'khor du shar ba ste /
NK071(du)004:56: de yang gzugs sku'i rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK071(du)004:57: thams cad chos sku'i ye shes nyid gdul bya'i don
NK071(du)004:58: du sngon gyi smon lam dang thugs bskyed kyi mthus
NK071(du)004:59: gzugs kyi rnam par shar ba ste /
NK071(du)004:60: sangs rgyas kyi sku dang ye shes ngo bo tha
NK071(du)004:61: dad du med pa'i phyir 'di ltar shes na bsdu
NK071(du)004:62: ldang gi spros pa mi dgos te /
NK071(du)004:63: snang bzhin du stong pa yin pas bsdu ba mi
NK071(du)004:64: dgos stong bzhin du snang ba yin pas ldang ba
NK071(du)004:65: mi dgos shing 'di la snang bcas kyi rdzogs rim
NK071(du)004:66: du bshad do // rim pa bgrod pa dbang ni
NK071(du)004:67: mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis gnon cing sa dang
NK071(du)004:68: lam gyi yon tan rnams btsan thabs su thob pa
NK071(du)004:69: la dbang pa'i phyir stobs kyi pha rol du phyin
NK071(du)004:70: pa ste sgo dbang gis phye ba'o //
NK071(du)004:71: mi 'da' ba dam tshig tshul khrims kyi pha rol
NK071(du)004:72: tu phyin pa ni dngos grub kun gyi gazhi'am srog
NK071(du)004:73: go / rol pa phrin las ni las bzhi lhun
NK071(du)004:74: gyis grub pa 'byung ba'i phyir smon lam gyi pha
NK071(du)004:76: don du gnyer ba sgrub pa brtson 'grus kyi pha
NK071(du)004:77: rol tu phyin pa ni don man ngag gis bde
NK071(du)004:79: nyams su len pa ting nge 'dzin ni dngos grub
NK071(du)004:80: myur du 'grub pa'i rgyu mi g.yo ba bsam gtan
NK071(du)004:81: gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
NK071(du)004:82: gnas su stob pa mchod pa ni nam mkha' mdzod
NK071(du)004:83: kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
NK071(du)004:84: phyin pa'o // zlos pa sngags 'chang ba phyag rgya
NK071(du)004:85: rnams ni tshegs chung ngus don chen po du ma
NK071(du)004:86: 'byung ba'i phyir thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
NK071(du)004:87: phyin pa'o // ste bcu'o / de yang phyogs mtshungs
NK071(du)004:88: dod thub tsam las 'di man ngag gi myur lam
NK071(du)004:91: gsang sngags tshul chen shin tu rmad byung ba //
NK071(du)004:92: thabs kyi nang nas ma nor dam pa dang //
NK071(du)004:93: lam gyi nang nas nye lam chen po ste /
NK071(du)004:94: shes rab nang nas shes rab khyad par can //
NK071(du)004:96: thabs shes gnyis ka'i kyang mdo las gsang sngags khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
NK071(du)004:98: don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang //
NK071(du)004:99: thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang //
NK071(du)004:100: dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas //
NK071(du)004:101: sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags //
NK071(du)004:104: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams //
NK071(du)004:105: rdo rje la dga' rtag pa gnas //
NK071(du)004:106: des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs //
NK071(du)004:107: rdo rje theg pa zhes bya'o //
NK071(du)004:109: da ni bsdus don gyi dang po lta ba bshad
NK071(du)004:110: par bya ba la lta ba rtogs dgos tshul gdams
NK071(du)004:111: pa dang / gtan la dbab pa dang gnyis las /
NK071(du)004:113: gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa //
NK071(du)004:114: de yi chos kyi dbyings mi shes //
NK071(du)004:115: de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa //
NK071(du)004:116: 'jig pas dmigs med shes par gyis //
NK071(du)004:119: gang dag stong nyid mi shes pa //
NK071(du)004:120: de yis mya ngan 'das mi shes //
NK071(du)004:121: de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa /
NK071(du)004:122: 'jig pas stong nyid shes par gyis //
NK071(du)004:124: man ngag gis bde blag tu rtogs mi nus pa'i las dang po ba dag gis /
NK071(du)004:126: stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul //
NK071(du)004:127: mi shes pas ni 'gro ba 'khyams gyur te //
NK071(du)004:128: de dag thugs rje mnga' bas thabs tshul gyi //
NK071(du)004:129: rigs pa brgya dag gis ni gzud par mdzad //
NK071(du)004:131: dbu ma thal 'gyur nas bshad pa'i rigs pas 'khor
NK071(du)004:132: 'das kyi chos thams cad bden zhen yul dang bcas
NK071(du)004:133: par rang bzhin med pa'i nges shes kyis sgro skur
NK071(du)004:134: dang bral ba'i gnas lugs shes pa'i lta ba shes
NK071(du)004:135: rab kyi mig gis ma mthong bar sgom pa'i lam
NK071(du)004:136: du 'jug pa ni nor ba ste /
NK071(du)004:137: kun rtog gis bzos pa'i bskyed rim thams cad dngos
NK071(du)004:138: 'dzin tu gol bas thun mong gi dngos grub tsam
NK071(du)004:139: 'grub srid kyang mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'chang
NK071(du)004:140: gi dngos rgyur mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK071(du)004:141: de'i phyir rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes
NK071(du)004:142: pa'i don dang po rig pa'i shes rab mig lta
NK071(du)004:143: bus zin pa'i lam sgom pa gnad du che ba
NK071(du)004:144: ni / bde mchog gi rgyud las kyang /
NK071(du)004:145: tshe gcig sangs rgyas thob 'dod pas //
NK071(du)004:146: dang po gdangs chen lta ba gces //
NK071(du)004:147: des na dang po lta ba bstan //
NK071(du)004:148: phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog /
NK071(du)004:149: nam mkha' lta bur shes par gyis //
NK071(du)004:152: bsam gyis mi khyab ma mthong bar //
NK071(du)004:154: rmongs pa mun pa'i blo can de //
NK071(du)004:155: long ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro //
NK071(du)004:157: don dam mthar thug dpyod pa'i ngor khas len rdul
NK071(du)004:158: tsam bzhag tu med pa 'di tsam gyis mdo sngags
NK071(du)004:159: kyi lta ba la khyad med ces smra ba byung
NK071(du)004:160: bas na / snang ba la dngos por bden par 'dzin pa dang /
NK071(du)004:161: stong pa la dngos med bden par 'dzin pa'i blo
NK071(du)004:162: mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'i dmigs med blo 'das
NK071(du)004:164: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo ni de yin pa'i phyir te /
NK071(du)004:166: rtag dang mi rtag la sogs bzhi //
NK071(du)004:167: zhi ba 'di la ga la yod //
NK071(du)004:168: mtha' dang mtha' med la sogs bzhi //
NK071(du)004:169: zhi ba 'di la ga la yod //
NK071(du)004:171: gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang //
NK071(du)004:172: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
NK071(du)004:173: rnam rtog med don tha dad med //
NK071(du)004:174: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do //
NK071(du)004:176: de yang chos kun gdod nas rang grol chen po
NK071(du)004:177: rnam par dag pa nyid gsar du ngo shes pa
NK071(du)004:178: tsam yin blos byas pa min /
NK071(du)004:179: srid zhi kun la ris med du khyab phyir phyogs
NK071(du)004:180: lhung nyi tshe min zhig blos don spyir gtan la
NK071(du)004:181: phab nas rtog med rig shes kyis rnyed rgyu yod
NK071(du)004:182: cing / bya byed kun de'i ngang gis 'thad pas
NK071(du)004:183: chad stong rgyu 'bras brlag pa'i lta ba'ang min no
NK071(du)004:184: cing / // gnyis pa la dngos dang /
NK071(du)004:185: gtan tshigs kyis sgro 'dogs bcad pa gnyis /
NK071(du)004:187: 'khor 'das gnyis kyi chos thams cad sems la rag las pa las gzhan du med de //
NK071(du)004:190: bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po nyid 'khor 'das kyi spyi gzhir bshad pa dang /
NK071(du)004:192: sems nyid gcig pu kun gyi sa bon te //
NK071(du)004:193: gang las srid dang mya ngan 'das 'phro ba //
NK071(du)004:197: lo ma la sog rgyun 'byung ltar //
NK071(du)004:198: de bzhin sems rdzas med pa yang //
NK071(du)004:199: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba'o //
NK071(du)004:200: zhes gsungs pas dang po nang sems kyi chos nyid
NK071(du)004:201: gtan la phab ste stong pa nyid du shes pas
NK071(du)004:202: phyi'i yul rnams kyang dngos por ma grub pa bde
NK071(du)004:203: blag tu shes par nus te /
NK071(du)004:205: gang gis dngos gcig de bzhin nyid mthong ba //
NK071(du)004:206: de yis dngos kun de bzhin nyid du mthong //
NK071(du)004:207: zhes 'di lta bu'i gang zag khyad par can la dgongs so //
NK071(du)004:209: gang gis chos kyi gtso bo mchog /
NK071(du)004:210: sems kyi gsang 'di ma shes na //
NK071(du)004:211: bde thob sdug bsngal gzhom 'dod kyang //
NK071(du)004:212: de dag don med kyi nar 'khyams //
NK071(du)004:215: tshe gcig sangs rgyas 'bras bu de //
NK071(du)004:216: gnyug ma'i yid kyis bsgrub par bya //
NK071(du)004:217: ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan de //
NK071(du)004:218: ma bcos sems kyis bsgrub par bya //
NK071(du)004:221: gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni //
NK071(du)004:222: pho mo ma yin ma ning min //
NK071(du)004:223: mtshan med ma yin rigs brgyud min //
NK071(du)004:224: kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin //
NK071(du)004:225: gnas su ma yin gang yang min //
NK071(du)004:226: de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te //
NK071(du)004:227: thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu //
NK071(du)004:229: mdo rgyud dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig pas /
NK071(du)004:230: 'khrul sems rnam par rtog pa 'khor ba'i sa bon
NK071(du)004:231: du gyur pa'i bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa 'di
NK071(du)004:232: la dpyad na dang po bskyed pa'i gzhi /
NK071(du)004:233: bar du gnas pa'i rtsa ba'am rten med pa'i sems
NK071(du)004:234: nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa 'di la pho mo
NK071(du)004:235: la sogs pa gdags su med cing /
NK071(du)004:236: de bzhin du bram ze la sogs pa rigs dang /
NK071(du)004:237: pha mes bu tsha sogs kyi brgyud med cing ma yin la /
NK071(du)004:238: sngo ser la sogs pa kha dog dang /
NK071(du)004:239: gru bzhi la sogs pa dbyibs su'ang med do //
NK071(du)004:240: nam mkha' bzhin du chos kun gyi rten du bshad
NK071(du)004:241: kyang rang gi ngo bo gnas sam rten gyi dngos
NK071(du)004:243: mdor na 'di zhes ngos bzung gang du'ang med pas gang yang min pa ste /
NK071(du)004:244: gong du ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis gtan la
NK071(du)004:245: phab pa'i gnas lugs de nyid sbyang gzhi bde bar
NK071(du)004:246: gshegs pa'i snying po rig pa rang byung gi ye
NK071(du)004:247: shes yin la / thun mong ma yin pa'i lta
NK071(du)004:248: ba'i khyad par de ni sbyong byed thabs kyi phyag
NK071(du)004:249: rgya ste gzhi snang lhun grub kyi rtsal lam du
NK071(du)004:250: shar ba dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi
NK071(du)004:251: shes yin la / rgyu yin no // de nyid
NK071(du)004:252: las dri ma dag rim gyi sbyangs 'bras gnas skabs
NK071(du)004:253: dang mthar thug gi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
NK071(du)004:254: pa 'byung bar shes pa ni rgyu shes pa'i mtshan
NK071(du)004:256: gnyis pa gtan tshigs kyis sgro 'dogs bcad pa ni /
NK071(du)004:257: lta ba la ldog pas dbye na don dam bden pa'i yul can chos nyid lta ba'i lta ba /
NK071(du)004:258: kun rdzob bden pa'i yul can chos can lta ba'i lta ba //
NK071(du)004:259: bden gnyis dbyer med kyi yul can rang rig lta
NK071(du)004:260: ba'i lta ba zhes rnam grangs gsum du yod pa'i
NK071(du)004:261: don la sgro skur bsal ba'i phyir gtan tshigs 'god
NK071(du)004:262: dgos so // de yang slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas /
NK071(du)004:263: gzhi dang gtan tshigs grub pa'i don //
NK071(du)004:267: grub pa'i mtha' ste gsum du bshad pa la /
NK071(du)004:268: dang po gzhal bya ni 'khor 'das gnyis su zhen
NK071(du)004:269: pa'i blo sgro 'dogs kyi zhen snang dang bcas pa
NK071(du)004:271: brtag pa'i spyod yul gnyis la gzhal //
NK071(du)004:274: brtag pa'i dngos la ma reg par //
NK071(du)004:275: de yi dngos med 'dzin ma yin //
NK071(du)004:280: gnyis pa 'jal byed kyi gtan tshigs la rnam pa
NK071(du)004:281: mang du yod kyang 'dir rtogs pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs
NK071(du)004:283: 'khor 'das gshis su gcig pa'i gtan tshigs yig 'bru'i tshul gyi gtan tshigs /
NK071(du)004:284: byin gyis rlob pa'i gtan tshigs /
NK071(du)004:285: mngon sum gyi gtan tshigs so //
NK071(du)004:286: de dag ni rim pa bzhin gtan la dbab tshul brjod par bya ste /
NK071(du)004:287: de la gtan tshigs yang dag yin na snang tsam du shes 'dod chos can grub dgos pas /
NK071(du)004:288: 'khor 'das gnyis phyogs chos su bkod na de la chos bsgrub bya'am gzhal bya skye med dang /
NK071(du)004:289: sgrub byed dam 'jal byed rgyu gcig pa gnyis ka yod pas chos can skyon med de 'grub la /
NK071(du)004:290: du rtags kyi me bzhin rjes su 'gro ldog yod
NK071(du)004:291: cing mthun dpe chu zla dang sgyu ma la sogs
NK071(du)004:292: pa'i steng du khyab pa'ang nges nus so //
NK071(du)004:293: dper na thun mong gi rigs lam na /
NK071(du)004:294: gzung 'dzin gnyis sam phung po la bdag gnyis su
NK071(du)004:295: lta ba'i 'dzin stangs shes pa yul bcas dgag bya
NK071(du)004:296: / bden pa'i phung gsum med pa khyab pa /
NK071(du)004:297: grub tshul gnyis la tshad med ma'i gnod pa mthong ba phyogs chos yang dag /
NK071(du)004:298: bdag med kyi nges pa rang shugs kyis 'dren pa bsgrub bya grub pa'i tshad dang phyogs 'dra'o //
NK071(du)004:299: 'di'i dgag bya 'khor 'das gnyis su bden par zhen pa'i 'dzin stangs yul dang bcas pa yin la /
NK071(du)004:300: gzhan rnams la'ang ci rigs sbyar ro //
NK071(du)004:301: de yang gtan tshigs snga ma snga mas gtan la
NK071(du)004:302: phab zin pa de phyi ma phyi mas gzhal bya
NK071(du)004:304: de yang 'di ltar dang po 'khor 'das gshis su
NK071(du)004:305: gcig pa'i gtan tshigs la brten nas chos thams cad
NK071(du)004:306: rang bzhin skye med du gtan la phab pa ni
NK071(du)004:307: / snang srid 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad chos can /
NK071(du)004:308: rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin te /
NK071(du)004:309: rtog ngor gnyis su snang yang don gyi gnas lugs rgyu gcig las gnyis su med pa'i phyir /
NK071(du)004:311: 'khor ba'i phung khams kyi bskyed gzhi rlung sems thams cad kyi 'byung khungs dang /
NK071(du)004:312: mya ngan las 'da' ba na snang gsum 'pho ba'i bag chags shin tu phra ba'i bar /
NK071(du)004:313: sgrib gnyis kyi sbyang gzhi mthar thug pa don gyi 'od gsal 'di la thug pa yin la /
NK071(du)004:314: des na 'khor 'das skye med du mnyam pa'i gtan tshigs rgyu gcig pa 'di las gzhan med do //
NK071(du)004:316: chos kun sgyu ma dang chu zla la sogs pa
NK071(du)004:317: bzhin bden pa gnyis char du yang rang bzhin gyis
NK071(du)004:318: skye ba med pa la so so ba'i rgyu ma
NK071(du)004:319: dmigs pa'i phyir // 'dir rgyu zhes pa /
NK071(du)004:320: chos kyi dbyings nyid chos can 'khor 'das thams cad
NK071(du)004:321: kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de dag gshis tha
NK071(du)004:322: dad med par byed pa'i rgyu zhes btags kyi /
NK071(du)004:323: skyed byed kyi rgyu lta bur go bar mi bya'o //
NK071(du)004:324: dper na ro mnyam dang ro gcig ces pa'i don dang mtshungs te /
NK071(du)004:326: 'khor 'das mnyam nyid bshad pa'i lung drangs nas 'chad chog pa'i phyir dang /
NK071(du)004:328: sngags rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni //
NK071(du)004:329: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te //
NK071(du)004:330: chos kyi snying po sgrub byed pas //
NK071(du)004:331: chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan //
NK071(du)004:333: gnas tshul la gnyis su med pa'i phyir snang tshul
NK071(du)004:334: gnyis su snang yang snang dus nyid nas gnyis su
NK071(du)004:335: ma grub ste / gnas snang mi mthun pa'i phyir sgyu ma bzhin //
NK071(du)004:336: 'di ni don gyi gtan tshigs ste chos nyid lta bas gzhal bya yin no //
NK071(du)004:337: gnyis pa yig 'bru'i tshul gyi gtan tshigs la brten
NK071(du)004:338: nas rol ba 'gag med du gtan la phab pa
NK071(du)004:339: ni / rang bzhin skye med kyi gdangs chos can /
NK071(du)004:340: khyod kyi rol rtsal 'gag med lha'i sku gsung thugs su rang snang ba yin te /
NK071(du)004:341: mtshon du med pa'ii yi ge a nyid mtshon byed
NK071(du)004:342: yi ge du ma ma 'gag par snang bas mtshon
NK071(du)004:345: a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /
NK071(du)004:346: don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
NK071(du)004:347: khong nas 'byung bas skye ba med //
NK071(du)004:349: de yang chos kun skye ba med pa a ste rdo rje'i gsung gi rang bzhin /
NK071(du)004:350: skye ba med bzhin snang bas don byed nus pa o ste rdo rje'i sku'i rang bzhin /
NK071(du)004:351: de nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes sgyu ma lta bu
NK071(du)004:352: mtha' dbus med pa ni ste rdo rje'i thugs kyi
NK071(du)004:354: 'bru gsum po yig gcig tu gyur pa ni rdo
NK071(du)004:355: rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin du mtshon
NK071(du)004:356: pa yin la / de 'dra ba'i yi ges mtshon
NK071(du)004:357: don shes nas brjod na bsod nams thob pa'i phyir
NK071(du)004:358: nor bu 'dzin pa'i sngags ces bya'o //
NK071(du)004:360: ni ci zhig yin par bshad //
NK071(du)004:361: mchog dang nor ster dpal dang g.yang //
NK071(du)004:362: skal bzang rnam pa dang ldan zhing //
NK071(du)004:363: dam bca' ba dang bkra shis don //
NK071(du)004:364: nor bu 'dzin pa'i sngags ces brjod //
NK071(du)004:367: sku gsung thugs su snang ba yi //
NK071(du)004:368: ma lus gsung gi rgyan du rtogs //
NK071(du)004:369: thams cad gsung gi yi ge ste //
NK071(du)004:370: thabs dang ldan pas rgyas gdab bo //
NK071(du)004:372: 'dir a yig nyid skye gnas kyi khyad par las
NK071(du)004:373: skye med du bstan cing yi ge kun gyi srog
NK071(du)004:374: tu khyab pa'i phyir chos kun gyi rang bzhin skye
NK071(du)004:375: med kyi don mtshon pa ni /
NK071(du)004:377: a yig gi gdangs gcig nyid skye gnas kyi khyad
NK071(du)004:378: par las yi ge'i bye brag du mar 'char ba
NK071(du)004:379: bzhin / sems nyid skye med kyi ye shes 'od
NK071(du)004:380: gsal ba'i rang gdangs cir yang 'char du rung ba
NK071(du)004:381: yang ye shes kyi rlung gi byed rtsol las yin
NK071(du)004:382: bzhin / par gsungs so // 'dir rang bzhin skye
NK071(du)004:383: ba med pa gcig nyid 'gag med sgyu ma'i rol
NK071(du)004:384: pa cir yang 'char du rung bas khyab ste a
NK071(du)004:385: bzhin / par gsungs so // yig bzhin no //
NK071(du)004:386: sna tshogs su snang yang rang bzhin don dam pa
NK071(du)004:387: nyid la nyams pa med de //
NK071(du)004:389: rang bzhin nyid la nyams pa med //
NK071(du)004:390: yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su //
NK071(du)004:391: bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de //
NK071(du)004:392: rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go /
NK071(du)004:394: de'i phyir chos kun stong bzhin snang ba mi 'gag
NK071(du)004:395: par snang ba ni stong pa rten 'byung du shar
NK071(du)004:396: ba'i don te gzugs stong pa'o //
NK071(du)004:400: rgyu dang 'bras bu chos rnams ni //
NK071(du)004:401: dam pa nyid du yod min cing //
NK071(du)004:402: rang bzhin gsal ba nyid kyi phyir //
NK071(du)004:403: stong pa nyid kyang ma yin no //
NK071(du)004:406: ye nas skye med ngang nyid la //
NK071(du)004:407: dgag bya med la bsgrub bya med //
NK071(du)004:409: skye med ngang du khyad par med //
NK071(du)004:410: skye med nyid kyang ma yin te //
NK071(du)004:411: skye ba'i dngos po snang phyir ro //
NK071(du)004:414: chos can lta bas gzhal bya'o //
NK071(du)004:415: gsum pa byin gyis rlob pa'i gtan tshigs kyis ngo bo dbyer med du gtan la phab pa ni /
NK071(du)004:416: skye med 'gag med kyi shes bya gnyis po chos can /
NK071(du)004:417: don dam gyi snang ldog sku dang ye shes sogs stong ldog tha dad du snang yang /
NK071(du)004:418: ngo bo lhag pa'i bden gnyis dbyer med du ro gcig pa yin te /
NK071(du)004:419: snga ma gnyis phan tshun 'gal med du rtogs pa'i byin rlabs kyi shugs las byung ba'i phyir /
NK071(du)004:420: mthar thug dpyod ngor gcig dang tha dad bral ba mdo las bshad pa ltar la /
NK071(du)004:421: tha snyad du bden gnyis ngo bo gcig la ldog pa tha dad 'jog pa 'gal ba med do //
NK071(du)004:422: yang na chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du
NK071(du)004:423: mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo dbyer med de
NK071(du)004:424: gtan tshigs snga ma gnyis kyis bden gnyis dbyer med
NK071(du)004:425: la nges pa 'drong ba'i byin rlabs kyi mthu las
NK071(du)004:426: byung ba'i phyir / yang dper na ras dkar po
NK071(du)004:427: la dmar pos byin gyis brlabs pas mthu brtson du
NK071(du)004:428: byung ba'i phyir / yod pa bzhin / rnal 'byor
NK071(du)004:429: pa'i sems kyi gnas lugs dang de'i rang rtsal ye
NK071(du)004:430: shes gnyis po dag pa'i rang bzhin du ye nas
NK071(du)004:431: yod pa de'i byin rlabs sam cho 'phrul las gang
NK071(du)004:432: snang gi chos thams cad bde ba chen po snang
NK071(du)004:433: stong sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i lha skur rang snang ba'i
NK071(du)004:435: zhes gsungs pa ni rgyal dbang pad+ma sam b+ha wa'i man ngag rdo rje'i gnas shin tu barlinga pa'o //
NK071(du)004:437: 'di lta bu'i rgyud sde chen po rnams su chos
NK071(du)004:438: thams cad ye shes kyi rang snang du sgrub pa'i
NK071(du)004:439: gnad chos kun gyi snang gzhi mthar thug pa gnas
NK071(du)004:440: lugs brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang /
NK071(du)004:441: de'i gdangs sems nyid 'od gsal ba'i ye shes zung 'jug 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
NK071(du)004:442: kun mkhyen chen po'i bka' chos rnams su kun byed
NK071(du)004:443: rgyal po'i rgyud drangs nas bshad pa ltar gyis chog
NK071(du)004:444: gi grub mtha' 'cha' ba tsam nas snang ba 'di
NK071(du)004:445: lha sku khra shig ger song ba'i gu dogs can
NK071(du)004:446: la sgrub lung mi dgos pas rnal 'byor dbang po
NK071(du)004:448: 'di'i don thun mong dang mthun par cung zad bshad na /
NK071(du)004:449: ji skad bshad pa'i snang stong gnyis gdon nas mnyam
NK071(du)004:450: rdzogs dbyer med bde ba chen por gnas pas da
NK071(du)004:451: gzod zung du 'jug pa tha dad du bya ba
NK071(du)004:452: med kyang / gnas skabs las dang po pa'i blor
NK071(du)004:453: bden pa gnyis res 'jog tu 'char tshul la ltos
NK071(du)004:454: nas go ba len pa na /
NK071(du)004:455: bum pa lta bu'i dngos po gcig la byas mi rtag gnyis so sor dbyer yod pa bzhin /
NK071(du)004:456: bum pa dang gzugs brnyan gnyis rten 'brel yin pa
NK071(du)004:457: 'dra bas dpe gzugs brnyan gyi steng du nges par
NK071(du)004:458: byas na / de'i snang stong gnyis ngo bo la
NK071(du)004:459: 'du 'bral med kyang snang ba dang stong pa zhes
NK071(du)004:461: de yang snang ba mtshon bya dang tha snyad tshad mas gzhal bya mtshan nyid /
NK071(du)004:462: mtshan gzhi chu zla'i snang tshul gyi steng du mtshon /
NK071(du)004:463: de bzhin du stong pa mtshon bya /
NK071(du)004:464: don dam tshad mas gzhal bya mtshan nyid /
NK071(du)004:465: mtshan gzhi gnas tshul dngos med kyi steng du mtshon pa'o //
NK071(du)004:467: rang ldog don ldog gzhi ldog ces bya'o //
NK071(du)004:468: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdo sngags kyi chos bstan pa thams cad bden pa gnyis la brten cing /
NK071(du)004:469: de yang drang nges kyi ngo bor gnas pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan par /
NK071(du)004:470: kun rdzob sgrub pa ston pa ni drang ba'i don no //
NK071(du)004:471: don dam sgrub pa ston pa ni nges pa'i don no //
NK071(du)004:472: zhes gsungs pa'i don 'di dang gzhan du bshad bya mang yang mi spro'o //
NK071(du)004:473: de'i phyir bden pa gnyis po ldog pa'i sgo nas
NK071(du)004:474: thabs dang thabs byung dang phan tshun med na mi
NK071(du)004:476: kun rdzob tu yod pa de don dam la ltos
NK071(du)004:477: med kyi gtan yod dang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
NK071(du)004:478: yod pa la sogs pa skyon can du mi bzung
NK071(du)004:479: bar / tha snyad tsam du btags pa'i rten 'brel
NK071(du)004:480: la nges shes skyes pa'i byin rlabs sam mthus don
NK071(du)004:481: dam la nges shes lhag par 'drong /
NK071(du)004:482: don dam par med pa de gtan med kun rdzob
NK071(du)004:483: la ltos med kyi chad stong du mi bzung bar
NK071(du)004:484: snang ba 'di'i rang bzhin med pa tsam la goms
NK071(du)004:485: pa'i mthus tha snyad la nges shes skye ba ni
NK071(du)004:487: nam zhig gcig tha dad dang blos btags pa'i snang
NK071(du)004:488: stong la sogs pa ga nga yang tha dad gzung
NK071(du)004:489: du med pa cig char du rtogs pa ni /
NK071(du)004:490: don gyi yin lugs zung 'jug khas len dang bral ba'i ye shes zhes bya ste /
NK071(du)004:492: snang ba dang ni stong pa dag /
NK071(du)004:493: so so'i char ni shes gyur nas //
NK071(du)004:494: gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa //
NK071(du)004:495: zung du 'jug pa de bshad do //
NK071(du)004:497: de ltar ma yin par bden gnyis phan tshun ltos med kyi tha dad du rtog na /
NK071(du)004:498: dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las /
NK071(du)004:499: bden gnyis tha dad gyur pa na //
NK071(du)004:500: ye shes lam ni don med 'gyur //
NK071(du)004:501: snang stong gnyis ni tha dad na //
NK071(du)004:502: rtag chad mthar ni lhung bar 'gyur //
NK071(du)004:505: rang rig rtog ge skam po dang //
NK071(du)004:506: mthar lhung dbu mar khas len pa //
NK071(du)004:507: de ni sems nyid rang rig dang //
NK071(du)004:508: brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
NK071(du)004:509: mi mthun pa yi phyogs yin te //
NK071(du)004:510: de bral bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
NK071(du)004:511: rang byung ye shes chen po yin //
NK071(du)004:512: zhes gsungs pa'i lung gi gnod pa yod do //
NK071(du)004:513: ma skyes pa'i chos nyid kyi rang gdangs chos can
NK071(du)004:514: du snang ba rnams dag mnyam du gtan la pheb
NK071(du)004:515: pa 'di yang / gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'i de
NK071(du)004:516: kho na nyid rtogs pa'i byin rlabs las khyab pa
NK071(du)004:518: yi ge a u ma gsum gyi yi ge'i sgra
NK071(du)004:519: gzugs gcig la srog gdan a'i rang bzhin dbyer med
NK071(du)004:520: pa'i dpe las don ye shes lnga la sogs pa
NK071(du)004:521: yang ngo bo skye ba med pa zung 'jug tu
NK071(du)004:522: rtogs nus pa'i mthu yod pa bzhin no //
NK071(du)004:523: 'di dpe don 'gal med kyi gtan tshigs te /
NK071(du)004:524: rang rig lta bas gzhal bya bden gnyis zung 'jug go /
NK071(du)004:525: bzhi pa mngon sum gyi gtan tshigs kyis mtshan nyid blo bral du gtan la dbab pa ni /
NK071(du)004:526: lhag pa'i bden gnyis dbyer med chos can /
NK071(du)004:527: khyod kyi mtshan nyid blo'i spyod yul las 'das pa yin te /
NK071(du)004:528: rang rig mngon sum gyis yul med bsam brjod las 'das par rtogs pa'i phyir /
NK071(du)004:530: chos thams cad ye nas dag mnyam bden pa dbyer
NK071(du)004:531: med de lung rigs man ngag dang mi 'gal zhing
NK071(du)004:532: / de dag gi tshig tsam la brten pa yang
NK071(du)004:533: ma yin par rang gi rig pas mngon sum gyis
NK071(du)004:534: myong bar yid ches pa'i tshe /
NK071(du)004:535: yid dpyod la rag ma las pa 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag lta bus nges nus pa yin no //
NK071(du)004:537: tshad ma thams cad kyi mthar mngon sum la thug pa bzhin /
NK071(du)004:538: chos thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'i don la
NK071(du)004:539: gnas lugs ji lta ba bzhin mngon sum du rtogs
NK071(du)004:540: pa'i ye shes nyid kho na tshad ma yin la
NK071(du)004:541: / rang mtshan dang spyi mtshan 'jal byed mngon sum
NK071(du)004:542: dang rjes dpag rnams 'jig rten pa'i blo la ltos
NK071(du)004:543: / nas bzhag gi / 'dir 'dod pa ma yin te /
NK071(du)004:544: rdzas kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas
NK071(du)004:545: bzhag pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir
NK071(du)004:546: ro // snang tsam la mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid
NK071(du)004:547: btags tshul yang ka bum dang me chu'i mtshan nyid
NK071(du)004:548: la sogs pa rnams phan tshun gcig la gcig med
NK071(du)004:549: pas thun mong ma yin pa'i rang mtshan zhes brjod
NK071(du)004:550: ro // la / de dag phan tshun ltos nas
NK071(du)004:551: btags pa tsam las ltos med du rang gi ngo
NK071(du)004:552: bos grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni tha snyad du yang
NK071(du)004:555: ngo bo nyid med par mi smra ba ni nga yi slob ma ma yin no //
NK071(du)004:557: de'i phyir gzugs brnyan lta bu'i snang ba tsam la
NK071(du)004:558: don byed nus pa'i dngos po dang rtag mi rtag
NK071(du)004:559: la sogs par brtags pa'i spros pa 'di ko shin
NK071(du)004:561: rnam par rtog pa phyin ci log pas sgro btags pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK071(du)004:562: de bzhin du ma dag pa'i snang ba 'di yang
NK071(du)004:563: rang mtshan par med pa log pa'i kun rdzob thag
NK071(du)004:564: pa la sbrul du snang ba'i kun brtags ltar la
NK071(du)004:565: / rnal 'byor pa la gzhan dbang dag pa'i snang ba yang dag kun rdzob ces 'jog pa ni /
NK071(du)004:566: thag pa'i dngos po nyid tha snyad du phyin ci
NK071(du)004:567: ma log par gzung du yod pa ltar 'thad kyang
NK071(du)004:568: / brgal zhing brtags par byas na de yang bden
NK071(du)004:569: dngos med par mtshungs pas sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid can
NK071(du)004:571: de ltar gtan tshigs bzhis bsgrub bya bzhi sgrub pa
NK071(du)004:572: 'di bden pa gnyis kyi chos rnams la yod med
NK071(du)004:573: dang gcig tha dad du 'dzin pa dang dag pa
NK071(du)004:574: dang ma dag pa rang mtshan du 'dzin pa dang
NK071(du)004:575: / mthar thug gi don yid dpyod kyi yul du
NK071(du)004:576: 'dod pa la sogs pa'i sgro skur bsal ba'i tshad
NK071(du)004:577: / tsam yin gyi / rnal 'byor pa rang la
NK071(du)004:578: mthar thug gi skabs su sgrub bya rang dbang bar
NK071(du)004:579: khas len du yod pa zhig sgrub pa ma yin
NK071(du)004:580: / tsam yin gyi / la / de yang gtan
NK071(du)004:581: tshigs snga ma gsum gyi lhag pa'i bden gnyis dbyer
NK071(du)004:582: med kyi don de nyid tshad ma'i gnod pa dang
NK071(du)004:584: phyi ma 'di rtog med rnal 'byor mngon gsum gyi
NK071(du)004:585: blo rtags su bkod nas 'di 'dra'i rnal 'byor mngon
NK071(du)004:587: sngags bla med kyi khyad chos rnams ma mthong ba'i
NK071(du)004:588: byis pa rnams la nges shes skyed par mdzad la
NK071(du)004:589: / 'on te shin tu lkog gyur tu song ba'i
NK071(du)004:590: don de dag gis rtogs par 'gyur zhes dogs pa
NK071(du)004:591: spong ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i rang rig mngon sum
NK071(du)004:592: la thug go zhes mdzad pa yin no //
NK071(du)004:593: de'i phyir ma mthong tsam gyis med pa min //
NK071(du)004:595: ma rig pa dang bcas pa'i sems rags pa can
NK071(du)004:596: kha cig gis ma mthong ba tsam gyis med pa
NK071(du)004:597: mi 'grub ste / yul dus kyis chod pa'i don
NK071(du)004:598: la sogs pas rang la'ang ma nges pa'i phyir ro
NK071(du)004:599: mi 'grub ste / // gtan tshigs bzhi po de
NK071(du)004:600: nyid kyis rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba phyin
NK071(du)004:601: ci ma log pa rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas nyams
NK071(du)004:603: snang rig stong gsum dbyer med bde ba chen po
NK071(du)004:604: don dam dkor bdun ngo bo nyid lhun gyis grub
NK071(du)004:605: cing / rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong pa nyid
NK071(du)004:606: gzhi la ji ltar bzhugs pa nyid dbang gis smin
NK071(du)004:607: nas lam du shar ba ste /
NK071(du)004:608: theg pa gzhan dang rgyud sde gzhan gyi lam nas
NK071(du)004:609: sbyong du mi nus pa'i snang gsum gyi bag chags
NK071(du)004:610: shin tu phra ba rnams lam 'dis tshegs med par
NK071(du)004:611: snyigs dus kyi tshe thung gcig la sbyong nus pa
NK071(du)004:612: yang / lhag pa'i bden gnyis dbyer med kyi rim
NK071(du)004:613: gnyis zab mo 'di la thug pa yin par gsungs
NK071(du)004:614: yang / so // gtan tshigs de dag gi don
NK071(du)004:615: rang bzhin skye med las rol pa 'gag med du
NK071(du)004:616: shar zhing ngo bo dbyer med yin pas rtag chad
NK071(du)004:617: ma grub rang rig pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor mngon
NK071(du)004:618: sum yin pas rtog bral yul med du nyams su
NK071(du)004:620: des na don dam stong pa rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i don rtogs shing goms pas /
NK071(du)004:621: kun rdzob 'khor bar snang ba'i dngos po rnams sbyangs
NK071(du)004:622: bsgyur med pa lha dang gzhal yas khang du rang
NK071(du)004:623: shar ba la snang srid gzhir bzhengs kyi bskyed rim
NK071(du)004:624: zhes bya la / de'ang gzhi las gzhi snang shar
NK071(du)004:625: ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don la nges
NK071(du)004:626: zhes bya la / shes skyes na / lam gzhan
NK071(du)004:627: ltar ma dag pa zhig sngags kyis sbyangs nas gzod
NK071(du)004:628: lhar bsgrub pas rgyas 'debs tsam ma yin cing /
NK071(du)004:629: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes nyid rig pa
NK071(du)004:630: chen po'i sngags su grub pa de nyid mngon du
NK071(du)004:631: gyur tshe / 'khor ba'i rnam par rtog pa gshis
NK071(du)004:632: su ma grub pas glo bur 'bral rung gi snang
NK071(du)004:634: sku dang zhing khams sogs gnas lugs ye shes dag
NK071(du)004:635: pa'i snang ba rnams rang sar gnas pa las gzhan
NK071(du)004:636: na med pa mkhris nad dag pas dung gi ser
NK071(du)004:637: snang de dkar po nyid du snang ba bzhin la
NK071(du)004:638: snang ba lhar sgrub pa zhes bya ba yin no
NK071(du)004:639: // 'di yang chu'i tsha ba yal ba dang rlan
NK071(du)004:640: gsher sogs rang gi gnas tshul ngang gis 'byung ba
NK071(du)004:641: // ltar / sems kyi bag chags zad pa dang
NK071(du)004:642: gnas lugs mngon du 'gyur ba'i tshul mdo lam na'ang
NK071(du)004:643: // ltar / yod la / des na mdo sngags
NK071(du)004:644: kyi grub mtha'i rigs pa smra ba'i lugs de yin
NK071(du)004:646: ba kun ldan gyi skye bo rnams da lta nas
NK071(du)004:647: rdo rje sems dpa' dang spang rtogs mnyam pa mi
NK071(du)004:648: srid pa'i thal ba 'phen pa de dngos gnas yin
NK071(du)004:649: na dmus long snying rje'i yul lo //
NK071(du)004:650: de 'dra'i bskyed rdzogs dbyer med blo las 'das pa'i
NK071(du)004:651: ye shes nyid la rtag chad kyi mtha' gnyis cig
NK071(du)004:652: car du bsal zin pas res 'jog gi tshul gyis
NK071(du)004:653: bsdu ldang gi spros pa yang mi dgos pa nyid
NK071(du)004:654: do // de las gzhan du 'khor ba'i rtsa ba
NK071(du)004:655: bdag 'dzin gnyis dang 'dzin stangs dngos su 'gal ba'i
NK071(du)004:656: rim gnyis zab mo'i gnad med par sems gzung 'dzin
NK071(du)004:657: gyi rtog pas bcings pa des bzos nas lha 'grub
NK071(du)004:658: tu re bas sgom pa ni /
NK071(du)004:659: bram ze me sbyin gyis stag bsgoms pa ltar rags
NK071(du)004:660: mthong gi mtshan ma tsam 'grub srid kyang yang dag
NK071(du)004:661: pa'i lam ma yin no zhes bshad do /
NK071(du)004:662: gzhan yang dgag bya khegs pa'i gnad med par bsgrub bya bsgom pas zab lam mi red do //
NK071(du)004:663: de'i phyir ma dag pa 'khor ba kun brtags kyis
NK071(du)004:664: stong pa'i chos can yongs grub ni gzhi snang bskyed
NK071(du)004:665: rim ye shes kyi bzung rnams snod bcud lha dang
NK071(du)004:667: rig pa ye shes yul can gyi rnam pa dbang shes dag pa rnams so //
NK071(du)004:668: de ni dag pa gzhan dbang ngo //
NK071(du)004:669: gzhan dbang gis stong pa'i chos nyid yongs grub ni /
NK071(du)004:670: gzhi'i 'od gsal de kho na nyid do //
NK071(du)004:671: de dag yid shes kyi ngo bo e wam kyis
NK071(du)004:672: mtshon pa'i bde stong dbyer med kyi ye shes rdo
NK071(du)004:673: rje 'chang gi rgyu'i gtso bo nyid du 'dus pa'o
NK071(du)004:674: // de dag la rim pa ltar chos can lta ba'i lta ba bskyed rim dang /
NK071(du)004:675: chos nyid lta ba'i lta ba rdzogs rim dang /
NK071(du)004:676: rang rig lta ba'i lta ba bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug rang rig gsal stong gi ye shes so //
NK071(du)004:677: dang po ni rgyu mtshan ma med pa dang /
NK071(du)004:678: gnyis pa ni ngo bo stong pa nyid dang /
NK071(du)004:679: gsum pa ni 'bras bu smon pa med pa'i sgo ste gsum mo //
NK071(du)004:680: yang sgyu ma lta bu dang rdo rje lta bu
NK071(du)004:681: dang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bshad
NK071(du)004:682: na chog go / gong du don dam dkor bdun ces pa ni /
NK071(du)004:683: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga dang /
NK071(du)004:684: thabs bde ba chen po dang /
NK071(du)004:685: dbyings stong pa nyid dang bdun no //
NK071(du)004:686: gnas lugs kyi 'od gsal brjod las 'das pa'i lta
NK071(du)004:687: ba mngon du gyur pa la 'di rnams brtsir rung
NK071(du)004:688: ste / rten byed pa'i cha nas sku /
NK071(du)004:689: brgyal ba lta bu ma yin par chos nyid kyi
NK071(du)004:690: gdangs rig pa'i cha nyams su myong zhing brdar sprod
NK071(du)004:692: gnyis su byar med cing rtog pa'i grwa zur las 'das pa'i cha nas thugs /
NK071(du)004:693: 'di la dmigs pas yon tan 'byung ba yang rang
NK071(du)004:694: gi ngo bo yon tan gyi rang bzhin du yod
NK071(du)004:695: par yon tan / de rnams bsal bzhag med cing
NK071(du)004:696: rtsol bas bcos pa med par lhun grub tu yod
NK071(du)004:698: phrin las bzhi po yang tshang ste /
NK071(du)004:699: mnyam bzhag gi ngo bo spros pa thams cad zhi bas zhi ba'o //
NK071(du)004:700: che ba'i yon tan stobs sogs 'du 'bral med pa rang chas su yod pa ni rgyas pa'o //
NK071(du)004:701: ngo shes ma shes tsam las 'khor 'das sems las gzhan du med na ni dbang ngo //
NK071(du)004:702: dbyings rig gi ngo bo la rnam par rtog pas glags mi rnyed pa ni drag po'o //
NK071(du)004:703: thabs dang dbyings ni dbye gzhir ldog pa tsam ste /
NK071(du)004:704: thabs bde ba chen po ye shes dang /
NK071(du)004:705: dbyings ni stong pa nyid de shin tu spros pa dang bral ba'i gazhi'o //
NK071(du)004:706: 'di rnams gzhi la 'jog pa'i tshe gzhi nyid spros
NK071(du)004:707: pa dang bral ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid
NK071(du)004:708: la 'byung rung gi nus pa tsam gyi ldog cha'o
NK071(du)004:709: // lam gyi skabs su ci rigs pa yod cing /
NK071(du)004:710: sangs rgyas pa'i tshe lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK071(du)004:711: 'di dag tha snyad kyi sgo nas brtag cing rjes thob nges pa 'dren pas dbye bar bshad kyi /
NK071(du)004:712: de kho na nyid la mnyam par bzhag pa ni
NK071(du)004:713: nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra ba'i phyir de 'dra'i spros
NK071(du)004:714: pa'i mtshan ma mngon gyur yod pa'i don du rtog
NK071(du)004:715: par mi bya'o // gsum pa grub pa'i mtha' ni /
NK071(du)004:716: de ltar gzhal bya zhen rtog yul dang bcas pa
NK071(du)004:717: 'jal byed gtan tshigs bzhis gzhal bas chos thams cad
NK071(du)004:718: gzhi rgyud bder gshegs snying po'i rang rtsal /
NK071(du)004:719: lhag pa'i kun rdzob bden pa /
NK071(du)004:720: lhag pa'i don dam bden pa /
NK071(du)004:721: lhag pa'i bden gnyis dbyer med blo'i spyod yul dang
NK071(du)004:722: bral ba gtan la pheb pa la grub mtha' zhes
NK071(du)004:723: gsungs so // 'dir kha cig mdo sngags kyi lta
NK071(du)004:724: ba la khyad par 'byed pa rnying ma'i lugs yin
NK071(du)004:725: gyi rang lugs la khyad par mi 'byed zer /
NK071(du)004:726: snga 'gyur rnying ma'i lta ba'i khyad par gsum las /
NK071(du)004:727: chos nyid lta ba'i ngos nas khyad par med de
NK071(du)004:728: sngags kyi lta ba yang spros pa'i mtha' dang bral
NK071(du)004:729: ba khas len med pa yin la /
NK071(du)004:730: rang bzhin gyis grub par 'dzin pa la yang dag pa'i lam sogs mi 'thad de /
NK071(du)004:732: lam la rang bzhin yod na ni //
NK071(du)004:735: thun mong gi theg pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa
NK071(du)004:736: nyid du tshul gcig pa dang bdag med pa'i lta
NK071(du)004:737: ba yang rgyu gcig pa'i gtan tshigs su 'du bas
NK071(du)004:738: mdo sngags kyi lta ba gtan la 'bebs pa'i man
NK071(du)004:739: ngag thams cad 'dir tshang ba ste /
NK071(du)004:740: rnam thar sgo gsum gyi stong pa nyid de mdo
NK071(du)004:741: sngags gnyis kyi thun mong gi lta ba yin pas
NK071(du)004:742: spyi don du shes dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK071(du)004:744: gcig dang du ma bral ba yi //
NK071(du)004:745: mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid //
NK071(du)004:746: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs ste //
NK071(du)004:747: rang byung ye shes gnas med dang //
NK071(du)004:749: de la dgongs nas sa pan gyis //
NK071(du)004:750: pha rol phyin pa'i spros bral las //
NK071(du)004:751: lhag pa'i lta ba yod gyur na //
NK071(du)004:752: lta de spros pa can du 'gyur //
NK071(du)004:753: spros bral yin na khyad par med //
NK071(du)004:755: de ltar min pa sgra ji bzhin yin na /
NK071(du)004:756: sgom de nyon mongs can du 'gyur //
NK071(du)004:757: spyod de ltung ba can du 'gyur //
NK071(du)004:758: zhes tshig rkang bzhi po bsgyur nas brjod pa'i don khas len dgos so //
NK071(du)004:760: rang rig lta ba'i sgo nas khyad par che ste /
NK071(du)004:761: rgyu mtshan nyid theg pa'i rtse mo bla na med
NK071(du)004:762: pa dbu ma'i lugs la kun rdzob tu snang ba'i
NK071(du)004:763: chos thams cad bden med sgyu ma'i rten 'byung tsam
NK071(du)004:764: du blta ba las dag pa lhar blta bar ma
NK071(du)004:765: bshad la / 'bras bu rdo rje theg pa thabs
NK071(du)004:766: kyi lam mchog 'dir ni snod bcud thams cad lha
NK071(du)004:767: dang gzhal yas khang du rang chas su bzhugs par
NK071(du)004:768: bshad la / blta zhing / de'ang dbyings dang gnyis
NK071(du)004:769: su med pa'i rang rig bde chen gyi dag pa'i
NK071(du)004:770: rnam rol lam rtsal las rang snang bar 'dod pa'i
NK071(du)004:771: bshad la / blta zhing / phyir te // rgyud 'di ru /
NK071(du)004:772: rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni //
NK071(du)004:773: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags //
NK071(du)004:776: mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni //
NK071(du)004:777: sangs rgyas lnga ru rab tu grags //
NK071(du)004:779: bcos nas lhar blta ba ni lam 'dir ma rig
NK071(du)004:780: par gtogs pas rig pa ye shes rang snang ye
NK071(du)004:781: nas lhun grub tu bod pa'i don te /
NK071(du)004:784: gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
NK071(du)004:785: ras dang tshon la sogs pa yi //
NK071(du)004:786: gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la //
NK071(du)004:787: byin rlabs ye shes dbab byas nas //
NK071(du)004:788: lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te //
NK071(du)004:789: bcos ma la sogs de ltar na //
NK071(du)004:790: phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la //
NK071(du)004:791: ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed //
NK071(du)004:792: ces gsar rnying gi rgyud sde dpag tu med pa las gsungs pa'i phyir dang /
NK071(du)004:793: sgyu 'phrul lam rim rgya gzhung las /
NK071(du)004:794: bla med theg pa'i nang nas ni //
NK071(du)004:795: don dam du ni dbyer med la //
NK071(du)004:796: kun rdzob tu ni thams cad la //
NK071(du)004:797: dag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin //
NK071(du)004:798: thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni //
NK071(du)004:799: rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag /
NK071(du)004:800: kun rdzob tu yang dbyer med la //
NK071(du)004:801: lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo //
NK071(du)004:803: snang gzhi stong par gzhal na spros bral las mi
NK071(du)004:804: 'da' yang gzhi snang dag pa'i kun rdzob rab 'byams
NK071(du)004:806: gzhi nyid rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong nyid la 'dod pa sogs shin tu spros pas chog go /
NK071(du)004:809: dri med dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni //
NK071(du)004:810: sku gsum ye shes gzhi dang bcas //
NK071(du)004:811: gang tshe dag pa de nyid du //
NK071(du)004:812: rang gsal mngon du 'char ba dang //
NK071(du)004:813: 'dra ba lam du byed pa la //
NK071(du)004:814: 'bras bu'i theg par yang dag brjod //
NK071(du)004:815: ces gsungs pas rgyud sde chen po rnams su 'bras
NK071(du)004:816: bu sku gsum lam du byas nas rim gnyis sgom
NK071(du)004:817: tshe chos sku lam byed la shu nya ta'i sngags
NK071(du)004:819: yul stong pa nyid dang yul can bde ba chen
NK071(du)004:820: po'i ye shes gnyis rtog pa nam yang dbyer mi
NK071(du)004:821: phyed pa rdo rje ltar zung du 'jug pa de
NK071(du)004:822: nyid gzhi 'bras kun tu rang bzhin rnam dag khyad
NK071(du)004:823: med du yod pa'i don yin par rgya bod gyi
NK071(du)004:824: mkhas grub yongs kyis bzhed pa yin no //
NK071(du)004:826: chos can lta ba de lta ba ma yin te /
NK071(du)004:827: lta ba yin na spros bral yin dgos pa'i phyir /
NK071(du)004:829: de la bshad par bya ste /
NK071(du)004:830: spros pa zhes bya ba blos brtags pa'i dngos po mtshan ma rnams yin na /
NK071(du)004:831: 'khor 'das kyi chos rnams la sgro skur byed pa'i
NK071(du)004:832: spros pa ma lus pa gtan tshigs bzhis bcad zin
NK071(du)004:833: pas 'dir tshad ma dang 'gal ba'i spros pa yod
NK071(du)004:835: snang tsam gyi lam rnams ni bzlog par bya ba ma yin no //
NK071(du)004:836: yang 'di ltar sems kyi dngos po'i sems nyid dngos
NK071(du)004:837: med kyi ye shes gtan la 'bebs dgos pa ni
NK071(du)004:839: dngos po'i gnas lugs la brten nas //
NK071(du)004:840: dngos med ye shes 'od gsal ba //
NK071(du)004:842: brtags pa'i dngos la ma reg par //
NK071(du)004:843: de yi dngos med 'dzin ma yin //
NK071(du)004:844: zhes ji skad gsungs pa ltar /
NK071(du)004:845: lta ba shes rab kyis chos can lta ba'i steng
NK071(du)004:846: nas bden pa gnyis dang 'gal ba'i spros pa rnams
NK071(du)004:847: gcod dgos kyi / chos can las gzhan na don
NK071(du)004:848: 'tshol sa dang spros pa gcod sa yod pa ma
NK071(du)004:849: gcod dgos kyi / mthong ngo // de'i phyir chos
NK071(du)004:850: can kun rdzob kyi snang ba bden med 'di la
NK071(du)004:851: gcig dang tha dad gang du'ang gzung du med par
NK071(du)004:852: gcod dgos kyi / mthong ngo // nges na /
NK071(du)004:853: bden gnyis dbyer med khas len dang bral ba'i dbu
NK071(du)004:854: ma chen pos song bas de la rtag chad kyi
NK071(du)004:856: khyed kyi ltar na don dam ma yin pa'i kun
NK071(du)004:857: rdzob tha snyad tshad mas grub pa'i steng du las
NK071(du)004:859: kun rdzob snang ba'i stong ldog don dam dang bral bas rtag pa don la gnas zin to //
NK071(du)004:860: de bzhin du kun rdzob ma yin pa'i don dam
NK071(du)004:861: tshad mas rnyed pa'i stong rkyang med dgag la spros
NK071(du)004:863: don dam stong pa'i snang ldog dang bral ba'i chad pa don la gnas zin pa'i phyir /
NK071(du)004:864: phan tshun gnyis ka la gnyis ka bsal ba'i nus
NK071(du)004:865: pa med pas rtag chad gnyis stabs gcig tu khas
NK071(du)004:867: des na nged cag kho na la klan ka smra bar mi bya'o //
NK071(du)004:868: gang zhig phyogs gcig thun mong gi theg pa la
NK071(du)004:869: zhen nas de dang rnam par bzhag pa 'gal ba
NK071(du)004:870: thun mong ma yin pa sngags kyi lta spyod zab
NK071(du)004:871: mo la / ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog pa la sogs pas rgol ba dag la /
NK071(du)004:872: lan bshad par bya dgos gang 'dir skabs su ma bab cing /
NK071(du)004:873: spyir yang dgos pa khyad par can med par rtog
NK071(du)004:874: ge'i tshig la rdo rje'i tshig gis rtsod na gsang
NK071(du)004:875: sgrags la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ba ste /
NK071(du)004:878: chos dang me rdzogs sems can dang //
NK071(du)004:879: rdo rje'i tshig la rtsod pa dag /
NK071(du)004:880: sngags pa dam tshig nyams byed pas //
NK071(du)004:882: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir re zhig btang snyoms bya'o //
NK071(du)004:883: de yan chad kyi sa rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid
NK071(du)004:884: lta ba grub mtha' dang bcas pa rags bsdus bshad
NK071(du)004:885: zin to // da ni gnyis pa rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin bshad pa la /
NK071(du)004:886: de sgom pa'i rgyu mtshan dang /
NK071(du)004:887: bsgom bya dngos gnyis dang po ni ji skad du /
NK071(du)004:888: dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pa //
NK071(du)004:889: rtogs pas dbang bsgyur ting 'dzin yin //
NK071(du)004:891: yid mnyam par gzhag pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK071(du)004:893: rtogs pa la rang dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir zhi gnas ting 'dzin bsgom dgos par bstan pa'o //
NK071(du)004:894: gnyis pa la 'chi bar skye gsum sbyong ba'i zag bcas kyi lam lnga ste /
NK071(du)004:899: tshom bu tshogs sgrub kyi rnal 'byor ro //
NK071(du)004:900: 'di la mos sgom dang nges rdzogs su sgom pa
NK071(du)004:901: gnyis las phyi ma ltar sgom na snga ma snga
NK071(du)004:902: ma goms nas phyi mar 'jug ste mthar chags su
NK071(du)004:903: sgom pa'o / gang ltar yang dang po ni /
NK071(du)004:904: gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems //
NK071(du)004:905: mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su //
NK071(du)004:906: zhes dang spyod 'jug las kyang glang po che 'dul tshul gyis sems 'dul dgos pa bstan pa ltar /
NK071(du)004:907: glang chen smyon pa khrom 'dul dang //
NK071(du)004:909: thos bsam gyi dus su rtags dang gtan tshigs sogs
NK071(du)004:910: kyis don spyi'i tshul du mthong ba'i rang bzhin thog
NK071(du)004:912: man ngag gi lam gyis dang po nas thad kar
NK071(du)004:913: ngo sprad pa'i thog tu spyi blugs su 'jog pa
NK071(du)004:914: gnyis gang rung gi sgo nas chos nyid de bzhin
NK071(du)004:915: nyid kyi ngang du mnyam par 'jog pa ste rnam
NK071(du)004:916: par mi rtog pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
NK071(du)004:917: gnyis pa snying rje sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor ni /
NK071(du)004:918: rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni //
NK071(du)004:919: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin //
NK071(du)004:920: ces pas stong chen de bzhin nyid kyi ngang nas
NK071(du)004:921: rtsal g.yos pa'i rtog tshogs gang shar thams cad bden
NK071(du)004:922: med sgyu ma lta bur rtsal sbyong ba ste /
NK071(du)004:923: 'khor ba'i chos thams cad log rtog sgyu ma /
NK071(du)004:926: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad thabs sgyu ma /
NK071(du)004:928: ye shes sgyu ma drug gi rang bzhin du shes nas /
NK071(du)004:929: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i sems can sgyu ma lta
NK071(du)004:930: bu rnams la sgyu ma lta bu'i snying rje mkha'
NK071(du)004:932: de yang ma na zhes pa'i sgra don 'gyur byas
NK071(du)004:933: nas stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa la'ang 'jug
NK071(du)004:934: ste / rig pa chen po'i sngags zhes pa la sogs pa'i don no //
NK071(du)004:935: gsum pa phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor ni /
NK071(du)004:936: sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
NK071(du)004:937: yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin //
NK071(du)004:938: yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya //
NK071(du)004:939: thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas //
NK071(du)004:941: gong du bshad pa'i stong nyid snying rje snang stong
NK071(du)004:942: bden pa dbyer med kyi ngo bo sems nyid a
NK071(du)004:943: dkar po'i rnam par sgom pa ni phra ba yig
NK071(du)004:944: 'bru dang / de nyid phyag rgyar sgom pa rags
NK071(du)004:945: pa lha sku la bslab pa ste de gnyis la
NK071(du)004:946: sgyu ma'am rtsa ba'i thabs ces bya'o //
NK071(du)004:947: 'di rgyu'i ting 'dzin te gzhan du rtsa ba'i sa
NK071(du)004:948: bon h+aum la sogs pa bstan pa de yin no
NK071(du)004:949: // bzhi pa phyag rgya spros bcas kyi rnal 'byor ni //
NK071(du)004:950: tha dad min las tha dad pa'i //
NK071(du)004:951: nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi //
NK071(du)004:952: dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhes gsungs pas //
NK071(du)004:953: rtsa ba'i thabs sam rgyu las byung ba 'byung bzhi
NK071(du)004:954: rim brtsegs rten gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa
NK071(du)004:955: dang / thabs bsam yas ni brten pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad de /
NK071(du)004:956: de gnyis ka'ang nyi ma dang 'od zer bzhin rig
NK071(du)004:957: pa'i ye shes nyid las don gzhan tha dad pa
NK071(du)004:958: ma yin kyang / nang gi lha dang phyi rol
NK071(du)004:959: gyi gzhal yas khang tha dad par snang ba'i dkyil
NK071(du)004:961: de yang mnyam bzhag mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
NK071(du)004:962: rnam rol du shar bas dag pa 'jig rten pa'i
NK071(du)004:964: 'di yan chad sbyong byed ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis
NK071(du)004:965: sbyang bya skye 'chi bar do gsum dang khams gsum
NK071(du)004:966: / sbyangs 'bras sku gsum 'grub rung gi rten 'brel bsgrig tshul dang /
NK071(du)004:967: ting 'dzin gsum gyi 'bras bu bskyed rdzogs sgom pa yang /
NK071(du)004:969: bskyed rim snang 'di'i bden zhen 'gog pa ste //
NK071(du)004:970: rdzogs rim sgyu mar zhen pa'i rtog pa spong //
NK071(du)004:971: gang la snang stong bden zhen med pas na //
NK071(du)004:972: bskyed rdzogs gnyis med rang bzhin dag pa yin //
NK071(du)004:973: ces gsungs pa ltar rim gnyis zab mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang bya sbyangs 'bras dang /
NK071(du)004:974: dag rdzogs smin gsum tshang tshul sogs rgyas par 'dir
NK071(du)004:975: 'dri bar mi nus pas gzhan du blta bar bya'o
NK071(du)004:976: // mdor na 'khor ba'i gzhi phung khams skye mched
NK071(du)004:977: mi spong pa'i thabs mang yang thabs bskyed rdzogs gnyis
NK071(du)004:978: // su 'du ste / thabs des zin na myang 'das kyi gzhir 'gyur ba'i phyir /
NK071(du)004:979: de yang dang po ni gzung 'dzin gyi snang ba
NK071(du)004:980: thams cad rang gi lhag pa'i lha gcig nyid du
NK071(du)004:981: shes shing nga rgyal gyis 'dod yon la ci dgar
NK071(du)004:984: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
NK071(du)004:985: ji ltar 'dod pas brten byas te //
NK071(du)004:986: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
NK071(du)004:987: bdag dang gzhan yang mchod par bya //
NK071(du)004:988: zhes spros med kyi rnal 'byor te bskyed rim de tsam gyis mtshan rtog bzlog pa'i thabs so //
NK071(du)004:989: gnyis pa spros bcas kyi rnal 'byor ni phung khams
NK071(du)004:990: kyi dbye ba ji snyed pa de snyed du lha
NK071(du)004:991: so so'i rnam pa rang shar te cir snang lha
NK071(du)004:992: sngags ye shes kyi rol pa sgom pa ste /
NK071(du)004:993: tha mal gyi zhen pa dang ril por zhen pa'i rnam rtog bzlog pa'i thabs so //
NK071(du)004:995: mdor na phung po lnga rgyal ba //
NK071(du)004:996: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yin //
NK071(du)004:997: rdo rje skye mched 'di dag kyang //
NK071(du)004:998: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /
NK071(du)004:1000: de dag rdzogs rim gyi thabs kyis mi rtog pa'i
NK071(du)004:1001: ting nge 'dzin la brten nas gzung 'dzin gyi rtog
NK071(du)004:1002: pa las grol ba'i 'od gsal la sbyor ba'o //
NK071(du)004:1003: de ltar stong pa chen po sogs bzhi ni tshogs
NK071(du)004:1004: lam yin pas zag bcas dang dam tshig nyams pas
NK071(du)004:1005: 'khor ba dang lam gzhan la ldog pa srid do
NK071(du)004:1006: // lnga pa tshom bu tshogs bsgrub ni /
NK071(du)004:1009: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas /
NK071(du)004:1010: dam tshig can skal ldan gyi mi dang /
NK071(du)004:1011: dgyes ldan gyi lha rtsa gsum dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs chen po tshom bur 'dus pa dang /
NK071(du)004:1012: 'byor ldan gyi yo byad bza' btung /
NK071(du)004:1015: sbyor sgrol gyi yo byad gang la'ang spang blang med
NK071(du)004:1016: par yul dang yul can thams cad lha dang chos
NK071(du)004:1017: nyid ye shes kyi rang bzhin du gnyis su med
NK071(du)004:1018: par rol bzhin phun sum tshogs pa lngas gzhi bzung
NK071(du)004:1020: 'bras bu rig 'dzin bzhis sa bcad de rdo rje
NK071(du)004:1021: 'chang gi go 'phang la 'god pa'i nye rgyu ste
NK071(du)004:1022: / 'di sbyor lam gyi rnal 'byor yin cing spyod
NK071(du)004:1023: pa'i dus grangs nges pas zag med la dngos su
NK071(du)004:1024: sbyor ba'i bar chad med lam yin pas phyir ldog
NK071(du)004:1025: / pa med pa'o // gsum pa mngon du gyur pa 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la /
NK071(du)004:1026: gnas skabs slob lam du gyur pa'i rig 'dzin bzhi dang /
NK071(du)004:1027: mthar thug mi slob pa'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par bshad pa gnyis las /
NK071(du)004:1029: 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog /
NK071(du)004:1030: ces pas mnyam bzhag chos nyid kyi dgongs pa mngon
NK071(du)004:1031: du gyur pas rjes thob gang la'ang 'jigs pa med
NK071(du)004:1032: cing snang spyod thams cad dag pa rab 'byams su
NK071(du)004:1033: shar bas / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs
NK071(du)004:1034: su rdzogs shing nang gis bgrod pa'i sa lam gyi
NK071(du)004:1035: ye shes rnams sgyu ma'i phyag rgya lhun grub tu
NK071(du)004:1036: rang shar bar 'gyur ba bstan to //
NK071(du)004:1037: de yang rig 'dzin bzhi'i 'gro lugs la bka' sde zur pa yab sras ltar na /
NK071(du)004:1038: rig 'dzin bzhi po'i ma mtha' mthong lam dang ya
NK071(du)004:1039: mtha' rgyun mthar 'jog pas de bzhi gang rung yin
NK071(du)004:1040: na sngags bla med kyi slob pa 'phags pa zhig
NK071(du)004:1042: ngos 'dzin pa kha cig rnam smin rig 'dzin mos spyod du 'jog kyang /
NK071(du)004:1044: nus pa thob dang ma thob las //
NK071(du)004:1045: mthong lam gnyis su 'gyur ba yin //
NK071(du)004:1047: sngags bla med kyis mthong lam pa yin kyang gang
NK071(du)004:1048: zag dbang po rtul ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis 'byung ba
NK071(du)004:1049: snyigs ma'i lus ye shes kyis mes sbyang bar ma
NK071(du)004:1050: nus shing yid 'od gsal gyi lha skur smin pa
NK071(du)004:1051: // lus rgya'i 'ching ba bral ma thag phyag chen rig 'dzin la sbyor ba'i rnam smin dang /
NK071(du)004:1052: rnal 'byor pa dbang po rno bas lus po yang
NK071(du)004:1053: la sogs pa'i 'ja' lus kyi yon tan khyad par
NK071(du)004:1054: can dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i sku mi dang 'dod
NK071(du)004:1055: gzugs kyi lha'i gtso bo'i cha byad du ston pa
NK071(du)004:1057: lar 'di gnyis don gyi 'od gsal grub pa la
NK071(du)004:1058: khyad par med kyang de las zung 'jug gi lha
NK071(du)004:1059: skur dngos su ldang nus mi nus la gzhag ces
NK071(du)004:1060: bla ma rig 'dzin gyi sar bzhugs rnams bzhed /
NK071(du)004:1061: sgom lam pa ni zung 'jug ye shes sgyu ma'i
NK071(du)004:1062: sku can mtshan dpe rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid phyag rgya
NK071(du)004:1063: chen po'o // don du sgom lam sa dgu la gnas pa phal cher yin no //
NK071(du)004:1064: mthar kha sbyor yan lag bdun ldan gyi ston pa
NK071(du)004:1065: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'grub ma rag pa'i sa
NK071(du)004:1066: bcu'i khyad par gyi lam pa zhig la lhun grub
NK071(du)004:1068: gnyis pa mthar thug gi 'bras rgyud yongs su rdzogs pa ni /
NK071(du)004:1070: d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas //
NK071(du)004:1071: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi //
NK071(du)004:1074: bla med lam gyi dri ma snang gsum phra ba'i
NK071(du)004:1075: bag chags dang bcas pa sbyangs pa las gzhi rgyud
NK071(du)004:1076: la ji ltar bzhugs pa'i yon tan mngon du gyur
NK071(du)004:1077: pa ni mthar thug gi 'bras bu ste /
NK071(du)004:1079: grub pa mthar phyin 'bras bu brjod //
NK071(du)004:1080: ces phar phyin theg pa'i 'bras bu las khyad par 'phags pa ste /
NK071(du)004:1082: gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas mngon du
NK071(du)004:1083: ma byas pa de dag ni bde bar gshegs pa
NK071(du)004:1085: mtshan gzhi mtshon par byed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag pa'o //
NK071(du)004:1087: de yang snang cha kun rdzob kyi ngos nas sgyu
NK071(du)004:1088: 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po dra
NK071(du)004:1089: ba stong nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i dbyings su
NK071(du)004:1090: mngon par rdzogs te byang chub pa na /
NK071(du)004:1091: phyogs bcu dus bzhir rdzogs pa'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad cig char du 'grub par 'gyur te /
NK071(du)004:1092: rgyal ba thams cad skye ba med pa'i ye shes kyi klong du tha dad med pa'i phyir ro //
NK071(du)004:1093: de ltar na 'bras bu sku dang ye shes mthar
NK071(du)004:1094: thug pa rnams thabs chen sngags kyi theg pa kho
NK071(du)004:1097: gang yang 'das dang ma byon dang //
NK071(du)004:1098: da ltar byung ba ma lus pa //
NK071(du)004:1099: gsang chen mchog 'dis ma bgrod par //
NK071(du)004:1100: byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te //
NK071(du)004:1101: zhes sogs lung mang du yod do //
NK071(du)004:1102: ji skad bshad pa rnams bsdu na gzhi rgyud bde
NK071(du)004:1103: gshegs snying po lhag pa'i bden pa dbyer med nyid
NK071(du)004:1104: lta bas gtan la phab nas /
NK071(du)004:1105: sgom pa ting nge 'dzin gyis nyams su blangs shing
NK071(du)004:1106: spyod pa tshogs kyi sgrub pa la sogs pas bogs
NK071(du)004:1107: dbyung nas 'bras bu rang gnas kyi dkyil 'khor mngon
NK071(du)004:1108: du gyur pa la rgyud don thams cad 'dus pa
NK071(du)004:1109: yin no zhes mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang po rnams
NK071(du)004:1111: sngon nas sku gsum brnyes kyang gzhan phan gyi //
NK071(du)004:1112: thugs rje'i gru gzings grub pa'i 'gro ba kun //
NK071(du)004:1113: rlabs chen 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol mdzad pa //
NK071(du)004:1114: rgyal kun 'dus pa'i sku brnyan rdo rje 'chang //
NK071(du)004:1115: spang blang spros kun rab zhi gdod ma'i dbyings //
NK071(du)004:1116: rnam kun zung 'jug bla med gsang mchog gi /
NK071(du)004:1117: chos tshul gdul bya'i rna bar 'khor mdzad pa'i //
NK071(du)004:1118: rig 'dzin rtsa brgyud bla mas bdag byin rlobs //
NK071(du)004:1119: khyab bdag rdo rje slob dpon grub pa'i gtso //
NK071(du)004:1120: bsam yas dkyil 'khor nyid dang dbyer med pa //
NK071(du)004:1121: gsang sgrogs dbyar gyi rnga chen mngon sum du //
NK071(du)004:1122: thos dag'i rnam 'gyur rma bya'i mdongs mtha' bzhin //
NK071(du)004:1123: phyogs dus rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku gsung thugs //
NK071(du)004:1124: gsang chen sngags kyi mthu las 'grub 'gyur zhes //
NK071(du)004:1125: rdo rje'i tshig gis lan brgyar basngagasa pa'i gtam //
NK071(du)004:1126: yid rton nges pa'i don du dam bca' 'o //
NK071(du)004:1127: grub gnyis dkar ba'i shes mtshan mtha' dag go /
NK071(du)004:1128: 'bab stegs bsod nams mngon mtho'i zla ba bzhin //
NK071(du)004:1129: tshe 'dir thar ba'i snang ba mchog sbyin pa'i //
NK071(du)004:1130: nges gsang sngags 'di ngo mtshar dam pa'i phul //
NK071(du)004:1131: mi shes sems kyis rtag tu dbyen spos nas //
NK071(du)004:1132: mi rtog ye shes lkog tu yibs gyur kyang //
NK071(du)004:1133: mi phyed mos gus dam pa'i byin snang gis //
NK071(du)004:1134: mi shigs snying gi don gsang mdza' bar 'gyur //
NK071(du)004:1135: zag bcas srid bde'i 'ching ba rdzun ris kyis //
NK071(du)004:1136: yongs gdung bsil ba lta ba'i mig bslus nas //
NK071(du)004:1137: zab mo'i zla gsang ga bur mdun 'khyil yang //
NK071(du)004:1138: ngang tshul log par gyur bas btung mi bzod //
NK071(du)004:1139: dug can 'khor mtsho 'di la yid skyo na //
NK071(du)004:1140: bden tshig thabs kyi bcud len mchis so 'tshal //
NK071(du)004:1141: mnyam sbyor rig pa gcig tu bzlums byas na //
NK071(du)004:1142: 'pho 'gyur bral ba'i bde chen grogs su 'char //
NK071(du)004:1143: don la rton pa'i rnam rig mi bzod cing //
NK071(du)004:1144: don med ltar snang mdzes pa'i gtam mang pos //
NK071(du)004:1145: don log 'khrul ba'i klong du mgo 'khor na //
NK071(du)004:1146: don ldan nyid du bgyi bar byed nus sam //
NK071(du)004:1147: rgyud chad dman pa gang zhig man ngag gi /
NK071(du)004:1148: snod min gdong lnga'i 'o ma rdza bum gyi /
NK071(du)004:1149: dpe ltar skal ba kun dang bral na yang //
NK071(du)004:1150: rin chen snod dang 'phrad na skyes kyi mchog /
NK071(du)004:1151: rgyas 'gyur dam pa'i rigs can skal bzang la //
NK071(du)004:1152: rdo rje'i gsang la grub pa'i bcud byin pas //
NK071(du)004:1153: brjod bral lhan skyes mngon pa'i rtags gsal bas //
NK071(du)004:1154: par dkar zla mthong bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur //
NK071(du)004:1155: tha shal snyigs ma'i kun rtog rlabs che ba //
NK071(du)004:1156: gzhan gyis gzhom du re ba rgyang bsring yang //
NK071(du)004:1157: mngon rtogs zab mos skad rig byang chub pa'i //
NK071(du)004:1158: lam la gus med bdag 'dra bdud kyis bslus //
NK071(du)004:1159: gdod nas gces 'dzin byas pa'i phung khams kyi //
NK071(du)004:1160: d+r+wa ba dar gyi srin bu'i 'khrul 'khor 'di //
NK071(du)004:1161: bcing grol med pa nam mkha'i mdud pa bzhin //
NK071(du)004:1162: shes pa'i thabs la dbang ba deng tsam mo //
NK071(du)004:1163: rtsod pa'i yang mtha' skye dgu'i dpal zad cing //
NK071(du)004:1164: rgyal bstan nyin byed dbang po grib so can //
NK071(du)004:1165: bstan 'dzin nyin skar bzhin du mi mngon pa'i //
NK071(du)004:1166: dus 'dir skyes pa'i rang mtshang mthong lags sam //
NK071(du)004:1167: sgrub brgyud gong ma'i gdan sa mthong bzhin du //
NK071(du)004:1168: mu to'i spyil bu bzung nas mgo skor gyi //
NK071(du)004:1169: rdzun snang 'chol ba sna tshogs bcos pa yis //
NK071(du)004:1170: rang gzhan sgyu mar bsgyur des ci zhig bya //
NK071(du)004:1171: rtsol med theg pa'i dam tshig de kho na //
NK071(du)004:1172: mi shigs rdo rje'i ra bar dam bcas pa //
NK071(du)004:1173: mtshon mas 'da' bar dka' ba'i khur chen po //
NK071(du)004:1174: 'chi med byang chub sems kyi rgyan du bkur //
NK071(du)004:1175: blang dor bcas pa'i bgo skal rang rgyud la //
NK071(du)004:1176: thob mtshams nor ba med pa'i dran shes kyi //
NK071(du)004:1177: yol gor 'khyil ba mes po'i ral klung bzhin //
NK071(du)004:1178: dag tshangs phyag rgya zab mo cis mi bcing //
NK071(du)004:1179: rnam grol mchog gi don bzang rin chen gter //
NK071(du)004:1180: rnam dpyod bum pa bzang po yongs bkang nas //
NK071(du)004:1181: blo ldan dga' skyed dpal gyi 'dod 'jo ba //
NK071(du)004:1182: snyan brgyud dam pa'i rigs su skyes thob lags //
NK071(du)004:1183: dpag yas grum mchog klu dbang rol pa'i gnas //
NK071(du)004:1184: rmad byung rdo rje snying po'i chu gter gyi //
NK071(du)004:1185: bsdus don snyan sdeb spangs ba'i ngag brtsams las //
NK071(du)004:1186: dge tshogs smon pas ci 'dod bsgyur rloms nas //
NK071(du)004:1187: sangs rgyas 'byung las ches dkon gsang sngags kyi //
NK071(du)004:1188: bstan dang de 'dzin nyi zla'i rnam thar bzhin //
NK071(du)004:1189: 'gog med gdul bya'i skal ba mtha' dag la //
NK071(du)004:1190: legs spyad dam pa'i snang ba 'byung gyur cig /
NK071(du)004:1191: rim gnyis lam gyi ye shes dbang chen po'i //
NK071(du)004:1192: las tshogs dpa' bo'i phyag mtshan rnon po yis //
NK071(du)004:1193: rgyal bstan 'khrugs pa'i log 'dren chu srin gdong //
NK071(du)004:1194: tshul min byed pa'i brtul zhugs 'grub gyur cig /
NK071(du)004:1195: dgag bya ma lus bden pa'i chings gcig tu //
NK071(du)004:1196: grub 'gyur dam chos yang gsang bla med kyis //
NK071(du)004:1197: rtsol bcas lam gyis sems rgyud sun pa rnams //
NK071(du)004:1198: rab 'byams dag pa'i tshal du khrid par shog /
NK071(du)004:1199: ces pa 'di yang sgyu 'phrul gsang ba snying po'i
NK071(du)004:1200: bsdus don blo skyor ba dang tshogs gleng 'dra byed
NK071(du)004:1201: rgyur mkhas dbang rig 'dzin gyi sar bzhugs rnams kyi
NK071(du)004:1202: zhal rgyun ltar sngags ram bsod chos ming pas bris
